effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Metamorphosis for 4 sec and gain Luck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 10 sec.
Set: The Hunt has a high chance to refresh its cooldown when you gain Luck of the Draw!

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,158 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 188 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Advance to the 50 Verses of Inner Resilience, reading as you are attacked.
Inner Resilience increases your armor by 3,679 and grants your attacks a chance to invoke a ward which absorbs 1 million Magic damage. When finished, sift through the passages to another chapter.
Use: Sift through the passages in the tome with increased Radiance. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Moonlit Cloak of Unrelenting Justice

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 117,913 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.
